entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Certificate trust list needs to be backported to 6.0.3xx (and maybe 6.0.1xx) #33928
  • Allow specifying path to local SDK in global.json #33924
  • `dotnet tool restore` cannot find the local manifest file #33921
  • Add `dotnet workload --version` command, display workload version other "info" commands #33912
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview 7 installed on Loc OS, Some strings of welcome description are unlocalized in CLI. #33900
  • When run a dotnet background service as a unix service is always show "Error: No space left on device" #33899

Closed

  • dotnet sln add doesn't support shared projects #22921
    Discussion
  • Remove obsolete suppressions when re-generating suppression files #28070
    8.0.1xx
  • GenAPI emits nullable attributes #33853

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33926
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #33917
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the existing NETSDK 1045 error message to link to the download page #33446
    Servicing-approved
  • Stabilize branding for the 7.0.400 release #33862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: sync CreateNewImageToolTask with new CreateNewImage properties. #33765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle when the target graph is TF/RID to pull out the TF piece #33863
    untriaged
  • Unblock sln add for a shared project #33837
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Enable BinSkim scan in nightly validation #33901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #33919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the runtime to 7.0.9 in public before moving codeflow internal #33920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #33916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #33915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #33918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure GenAPI doesn't emit reserved attributes #33888
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
